actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to allow the Secretary of a military department to accept voluntary, uncompensated services from persons desiring to provide such services in programs designed for the morale and support of military members and their families.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of a military department to accept the services of volunteers in programs designed for the morale and support of military members or their families.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to allow the Secretary of a military department to accept voluntary, uncompensated services from persons desiring to provide such services in programs designed for the morale and support of military members and their families.
